translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

A general upheaval in all enemy forces, and at various points of the State, indicates the result of a combined plan against the freedom and independence of the continental people, since the unexpected appearance of some imperial groups in the most easily accessible places, their horrific outrages, confirms this truth: reason enough and powerful to vigorously develop the effective means to thwart their machinations.

Your Excellency Division of the Left, not excepting a single man who can ride a horse, suspending all ordinances, whatever the authority, even those most absolute, because the crisis thus urges and determines.

You will also order to muster all the cavalry available, recording the names of the owners and the number of horses provided, so that when returned those missing may be paid for from the national coffers, which the government expects from the activity and patriotism of Your Excellency.

God preserve Your Excellency  
Secretary of War Affairs at Caçapava, December 19, 1839.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Official letter from the Excellent Minister of War dated December 19, received on the 25th of the same month. Circular.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police.
